description:
Lum`s takes drastic measures to keep Shinobu away from her darling! Oh, and he accidentally summons a lecherous little demon too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black Hole Love Triangle / It`s a Lovesick Little Demon!
Il triangolo dell`amore - Un piccolo demonio
Koi no Sankaku Black Hole / Horehore Koakuma Dakkya!
Pauvre Ronny / C`est un amour de petit démon
恋の三角 ブラックホール - ホレホレ 小悪魔だっきゃ!
